column4: Hi, has anyone had any problems installing nvidia-glx-legacy on breezy ?? I'm getting a conflict with libmesa, and I have no idea what I can do about it
Hi, has anyone had any problems installing nvidia-glx-legacy on breezy ?? I'm getting a conflict with libmesa, and I have no idea what I can do about it
uninstalling mesa also uninstall alot of packages that depend on it
